title: CSS Tutorial
description: CSS is a language that describes the style of an HTML document and how HTML elements should be displayed.

title: CSS Introduction
description: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets

title: CSS Syntax and Selectors
description: A CSS rule-set consists of a selector and a declaration block

title: CSS how to
description: When a browser reads a style sheet, it will format the HTML document according to the information in the style sheet.

title: CSS Colors
description: HTML and CSS supports 140 standard color names.
